programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.

programme.title: Ishqiya
programme.desc: Khalujaan and Babban, two thugs, are on the run from their boss. They seek refuge at an old friend’s house but meet Krishna, his widow, instead. Both of them fall for her, oblivious to the fact that Krishna is manipulating them for her own gain.

programme.title: Surkhaab
programme.desc: Jeet, a former judo champion, illegally migrates to Canada from a small town in Punjab to visit her brother Pargat. However, she gets entangled in human trafficking with no way out.

programme.title: Firaaq
programme.desc: Inspired from the 2002 violence in Gujarat, this drama follows the lives of different people directly or indirectly affected by the riots, from a compassionate woman in an orthodox Gujarati family living with a stone-hearted husband, an urban cross-culture couple with a Hindu wife and a Muslim husband, a poor Muslim couple whose house is charred to ashes during the riots to an old Muslim singer. As their stories unfold and intertwine, we see the harrowing picture of the repercussions of violence in society.

programme.title: Souten Ki Beti
programme.desc: Shyam lives a happy life with his loving wife Rukmini. However their life turns upside down when circumstances bring back Radha Shyam’s long lost love whom he had left impregnated to his life along with their daughter.

programme.title: Roti
programme.desc: Upon being sentenced to death Mangal a hardened criminal escapes prison. He assumes a new identity in a small village and builds a new life for himself as a school teacher but his past catches up with him and now he must deal with its aftermath.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Sachaa Jhutha
programme.desc: An innocent countryman, Bhola comes to Mumbai to earn money for his sister’s marriage. But he gets mistaken for a deadly criminal named Ranjit who uses Bhola as a pawn to fool the police so he can carry out his nefarious deeds.

programme.title: Khakee
programme.desc: DCP Anant and his team are assigned to escort an alleged terrorist from Chandangarh to Mumbai. His seemingly simple mission turns into a deadly encounter of survival when a rogue ex-cop turned criminal hinders his way.

programme.title: Aankhen
programme.desc: When Vijay Singh Rajput is unceremoniously stripped of his duties as a bank manager, he decides to seek revenge by robbing the bank. To make the robbery untraceable, he trains three blind men to do the job for him.
